title: BEAUTIFUL HYPNOTIOC CRISIS IN THE PARK
description:
These images are from the masterclass of Dr. Marco Paret - Magnetic path. The object is experiencing a beautiful hypnotic crisis in the park, where she can be closer to nature. The hypnotic crisis has a power of liberation and healing. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
